products.name: Peter Jean
products.description: Elevate your denim game with the stylish John Varvatos Peter Jean. Crafted from a premium blend of 99% cotton and 1% Lycra Spandex, these jeans offer the perfect mix of comfort and stretch. The black and blue color/pattern adds a modern twist to this classic wardrobe essential. With an inseam of approximately 33 inches, these jeans are designed to hit at the perfect length. Easy to care for, simply toss them in the washing machine for hassle-free maintenance. Imported for the highest quality, these John Varvatos jeans are a must-have for any fashionable man.

products.name: Penny Patent Loafer
products.description: Introducing the Christian Louboutin Penny Patent Loafer, the epitome of elegance and technical proficiency. Made in Italy with precision craftsmanship, this black patent leather loafer features a silver-tone logo coin and zigzag trim for a touch of luxury. The lightly padded leather insole provides all-day comfort, while the smooth leather sole and 1-inch heel offer a sophisticated finish. Please note that this brand typically runs small and narrow, so we recommend sizing up a half to full size for the best fit. Elevate your shoe collection with this iconic design from Christian Louboutin.

This item comes from a brand rated three out of five ('It's A Start') by Good on You at the time it was added on FARFETCH. products.name: Fred Perry Twin Tipped Polo Shirt
products.brandedName: Fred Perry Twin Tipped Polo Shirt
products.description: Theres a reason why the Fred Perry twin tipped polo shirt - otherwise known as the British subcultural uniform - has been embraced by generations since its debut in the 1950s. An evolution of the original tennis-inspired style worn by the designer himself, the next chapter of the Fred Perry shirt sees even closer attention to the details, note the brand's signature cotton piqué, contrasting stripes to the collar and cuffs and, of course, the iconic Laurel Wreath embroidered to the chest.

products.description: Let your bag be the ultimate assist. Unlock the peel-top opening's magnetic closure with a simple push of the finger to easily access your gear. Adjust the shoulder straps for a crossbody carry, or use the wheelchair straps if that's more your speed. Designed to Help You Get Moving:FlyEase is now Nike EasyOn. Our Nike EasyOn features help make our products easy to wear and use, letting you gear up and get moving quicker. Picture This:A diagram on the inside of the bag guides you through the closure system and multiple carrying options. Whether you prefer the dual shoulder straps, the across-the-chest look or the wheelchair design, this graphic has you covered. Open That:Digging through your bag is a thing of the past. The full clamshell opening down the side helps provide easy access to all of your gear. More Benefits:Padded shoulder straps are adjustable for a comfortable fit. Footwear compartment helps separate your shoes from your clothes. U-pull zipper pulls help make unzipping easier. Internal pockets help you stay organized. Product Details:12" W x 21" H x 9" D. products.description: A sporty soul characterizes this shoulder bag made of Re-Nylon, a fabric made from regenerated nylon yarn produced from recycled, purified plastic materials collected in the ocean, fishing nets, and textile fibers.
